1.title: Let's Put on a Show
1.plot: Leigh gives a sneak peek into the format and goals of the show and sets the stage for upcoming installments and guests.

2.title: The ASTD Interview
2.plot: The Learning Show is an award-winning new training industry talk show with host, Leigh Gregory. In this informative feature on ASTD 2013, Leigh welcomes guest, Kristen Fyfe Mills, Senior Communications Manager for ASTD. So take a break, meet Kristen, and have some fun and a few laughs with Leigh. And learn new facts about the industry and the premier training and development organization on the planet while you're at it. You know you want to watch it.

3.title: The Training Magazine Interviews
3.plot: Leigh interviews Mike Murrell and Phil Jones, the managing partners of Training Magazine. The nearly 50 year old publication is a giant in the worldwide training industry. Mike and Phil dropped by The Learning Show during ASTD 2013 to talk to Leigh about what's up and what's new with their print, online and event efforts for the rest of 2013 and beyond. Don't miss this one, good people. What else have you got going on at the moment?

4.title: The Lynda.Com Interview
4.plot: Lynda.com's senior product manager, Koreen Pagano joins Leigh for the learning fun.Lynda.com is the online video training service that offers technical, creative and business skills courses to anyone looking to foster lifelong learning. If you like fun and learning, you'll love this installment. Go ahead, just click play.

5.title: The Elliott Masie Interview
5.plot: Leigh covers gameful learning, manager meetings and talks with learning futurist and learning guru, Elliott Masie. Go ahead and press play.

6.title: The PIHRA Interviews
6.plot: Leigh interviews Wayne Munyer and Rafael Rivera of PIHRA. The interviews were shot during ELCE 13 and the California HR Conference in Anaheim. You don't want to miss Leigh's riff on Dr. Tasha Eurich's revealing leadership article in Training Industry Quarterly. Take a break and catch The Learning Show.

locations: Woodland Hills, Los Angeles, California, USA::(studio) (Lightform Studios)
imdb.title: The Learning Show
plot: _The Learning Show_ (qv) is a late night style talk show designed to share a little fun and shed some serious light on the movers, shakers and rock stars of the $360B global learning industry.
